name: GLITCH (itch) (medsalahkaabii)
description:
- Game Made in 48 Hours of Global Game Jam 

- IDEA : Using the theme "REPAIR" i made A game which repair itself , by the progress of the player in fixing programming bugs in the environment .

- CONTROLS : Move Right or Left by using Arrows and Jump by up arrow , and use Zoom Tool on the Upper Right of the screen to see Code of objects in the enivronment
